content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the decision identified as iv 10292021 was made on february 21 2022 the court fee for the case is 612 euros which the heirs are responsible for paying based on their inherited shares the procedure started on february 19 2021 and ended on february 21 2022 lasting for a total of 1 year and 3 days the final resolution of the case involves the distribution of goods with a total value of 52000 eur including three real estate properties a share in a pension plan and funds in a bank account there are five heirs involved in the case and adjustments were made to their shares due to the death of some heirs the court used specific articles from the inheritance act to make the decision the court is still waiting for some missing information and will make a final decision on february 21 2022 the appeal process is also explained stating that it must be filed within 15 days of receiving the written decision and certain requirements must be met for the appeal to be considered valid
